species.name: lampent
descriptions: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp. Once it finds someone whose death is near, it will trail quietly after them.
The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.
This Pokémon appears just before someone passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary of death.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.effect: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

abilities.name: flame-body
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
